syllabus_info.syllabus_name: Cambridge International AS & A Level Chemistry 9701

learning_objectives.description: define the stability constant, Kstab, of a complex as the equilibrium constant for the formation of the complex ion in a solvent (from its constituent ions or molecules)
write an expression for a Kstab of a complex ([Hâ‚‚O] should not be included)
use Kstab expressions to perform calculations
describe and explain ligand exchanges in terms of Kstab values and understand that a large Kstab is due to the formation of a stable complex ion
